Package net.sourceforge.pebble.util

Class Summary
CookieUtils Utilities for finding and manipulating cookies.
ExceptionUtils A collection of utility methods for manipulating exceptions.
FileUtils A collection of utility methods for manipulating files.
HttpsURLRewriter Rewrite Urls to use the given scheme, typically https.
MailUtils Utilities for e-mail related functions.
NullUrlRewriter Don't rewrite URLs
Pageable<T> Helper class that implements paging over a collection.
RelativeDate Represents a relative date (the time since something happened).
SecurityUtils A collection of utility methods for security.
StringUtils A collection of utility methods for manipulating strings.
UpgradeUtilities Utilities for upgrading blogs.
UrlRewriter This class is used to keep track of a thread local instance for rewriting URLs - ultimately for deciding if a link should be decorated 'secure' (as in config value secureUrl) or plain.
Utilities Utilities for the current blog, such as those useful for moving between versions of Pebble.
